Title(s): ‘For few be trew to tryst vpon’
_description: ‘For few be trew to tryst vpon’ — eleven quatrains (aaab) with this refrain, and burden: ‘In a blyssefull tyme that mane ys borne / That may fynd frend to trust vpon’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines: Euery mane in hys degreCane say yf he avysyd be…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…þou send vs all a good endyngfor þou art trew to
                    tryst vpon
BodEngPoete1.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,
                        ed.  
             Songs and Carols from a manuscript…of the Fifteenth
                Century.
Percy Society
         23. London: Richards, 1847: 10-12.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 258-9; 1977, 229.
